Attacking is the only way to get money? He stole less than 10k for all his attacks so far...

The only thing he is doing is wreaking my Infrastructure...

Well, he made peace. Now I need to find a way to help him as he said this:

And there you see part of my problem, my nation eats everything it produces at this point in time, I net in total a single barrel of oil a day.

I hadn't been aware that my allies had decided to attack you all as well though, I suppose when I mentioned I was they decided to tag along.
Yay we should create a peace package ,and now I need save up for more supplies.

Congrats on the peace with Ponyville, MGUARN. I note, with some dismay, that this hasn't translated into peace with the other attacking nations yet. Hopefully we'll have truces up by the end of the day.

A reminder that I have free munitions up on the trade page: check "trade" and click on "alliance trade offers" - it's not much, but I hope it helps.

Further, I notice that one of our members has declared war on an unaffiliated nation. I mention this because it doesn't seem wise to launch attacks elsewhere when we have a bigger alliance breathing down our Kerbal necks.

Designer225, what exactly is being asked? What resources and in what quantity? I'm a little concerned whether or not we can meet the demand, as well as whether or not we can build up our defense if and when the demands on us increase.
